useCase.name: Researcher Adds Publication to Repository and Generates Report

preconditions.precondition: Researcher is logged into the DMPTool.
Researcher has navigated to the project DMP.

useCase.trigger: Researcher selects to Add Publication in DMPTool.

mainSequence.step: Researcher navigates to the project DMP.
Researcher enters publication details into DMPTool.
DMPTool checks if the publication is in the Repository.
DMPTool links publication with DMP record.
Researcher requests research output report from DMPTool.
DMPTool fetches all publications linked to DMP from the Repository.
Reporting Module generates a report based on the publications.
DMPTool displays/downloads the generated report for Researcher.
